casebody.data:
CLEVELAND METRO. BAR ASSN.
v.
MARIOTTI 2018-1579 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 19, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On respondent Mark Mariotti's motion to reinstate. Motion granted. Mark

Mariotti, Attorney Registration No. 0067608, last known business address in Cleveland, Ohio, reinstated to the practice of law.
